Person.AdditionalInformation: I participated in many computer science and math competitions at different levels in school.Some of them are national, others – regional level. All of my places are in top 10. I successfully achieved 1st place in national competition – third national competition of IT – Blagoevgrad city 2011 category “application programs” – IX – XII class.
